urls.title: Environmental Talk (@environmentaltalk_) ‚Ä¢ Instagram photos and videos
urls.description: 74 Followers, 20 Following, 79 Posts - See Instagram photos and videos from Environmental Talk (@environmentaltalk_)

urls.title: Environmental Talk
urls.description: Our vision and mission are simple: 1) Create a community that helps consumers to find their own shade of green, adopt environmentally sound practices and drive impact full environmental changes. 2) Give awareness to the people and the students related to the environment. 3) Promote recycling 4) Promote Reforestation 5) Discussing Environmental issues and their solutions We are here to deliver a mix of targeted media content and so that you can live a happier, healthier, sustainable lifestyle; one that protects this wonderful planet we all call home. Please Subscribe our channel for more https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC15_8n7UHv_1YmLLh73V-Og Facebook page https://www.facebook.com/TheMoStBeAuTiFuLlPlAcEsInTheWoRld https://web.facebook.com/EnvironmentalTalk/ Instagram page https://www.instagram.com/beautifulplaces381/ https://www.instagram.com/environmentaltalk_/
